thesis: Risk-on week. Tech earnings strong, Fed maintaining rates. Crypto consolidating after recent rally but sentiment remains positive.

biases.reasoning: Institutional inflows continue, ETF volumes strong. Support at $90k holding.
Layer 2 activity up, staking yields attractive. Following BTC momentum.
AI demand unabated, earnings beat expected. Buy on any dip.
Crypto volumes rising, benefits from BTC rally. High beta play.
Strong momentum but overbought short-term. Wait for pullback.
